refnamediv.refpurpose: ob_start callback function to gzip output buffer

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ob_gzhandler is intended to be used as a callback function for ob_start to help facilitate sending gz-encoded data to web browsers that support compressed web pages. Before ob_gzhandler actually sends compressed data, it determines what type of content encoding the browser will accept ("gzip", "deflate" or none at all) and will return it's output accordingly. All browsers are supported since it's up to the browser to send the correct header saying that it accepts compressed web pages.

note.para:
You cannot use both ob_gzhandler and
ini.zlib.output_compression. Also note that using ini.zlib.output_compression is preferred over ob_gzhandler.
